response.name: Analyze content differences
response.body:
{
    "message": "Content analysis successfully",
    "data": {
        " messaging": [
            "Changed the tagline from 'Run go-to-market intelligently.' to 'Transform Your Revenue Engine.'",
            "Updated the revenue growth metrics from 'Unlock 30% more revenue in half the time.' to 'Increase revenue by 50% while reducing CAC by 40%.'",
            "Enhanced messaging around AI-driven signals, customer intelligence, and automated workflows.",
            "Revised customer success stories to showcase stronger metrics, such as 'achieved 150% pipeline growth using AI-driven signals' vs. previous metrics."
        ],
        " pricing": [
            "Updated Starter pricing from $7.5k to $15k billed annually.",
            "Increased Team pricing from $15k to $30k billed annually.",
            "Introduced custom pricing for the Enterprise tier, focusing on tailored solutions for organizations."
        ],
        "product": [
            "Introduced Smart Signals for AI-powered signal detection across channels, replacing Signals Capture.",
            "Renamed Person360™ to CustomerDNA™ for a complete 360° view of customers and accounts.",
            "Updated RoomieAI™ to InsightAI™, introducing next-gen revenue intelligence with AI.",
            "Replaced Job Changes with Career Transitions, and Website Visits with Visitor Intelligence.",
            "Modified Product-led sales to Product Engagement Analytics, reflecting a focus on engagement metrics.",
            "Adjusted Automation to Revenue Automation, emphasizing intelligent automation for revenue generation.",
            "Altered Platform Overview to emphasize the unified revenue platform instead of customer intelligence."
        ]
    }
}

response.name: Analyze visual differences Copy
response.body:
{
    "message": "Content analysis successfully",
    "data": [
        {
            "category": "Pricing",
            "summary": "The pricing structure has been updated: Starter has transitioned to Professional with an increase to $15k annually, Team is now Business at $30k annually, and Enterprise offers Custom pricing tailored to specific organizational needs.",
            "changes": [
                "Starter pricing changed from $7.5k billed annually to Professional $15k billed annually.",
                "Team pricing changed from $15k billed annually to Business $30k billed annually.",
                "Enterprise pricing changed from tailored to your organization to Custom pricing for your needs."
            ]
        },
        {
            "category": "Product",
            "summary": "Recent changes include the renaming and enhancement of key features to leverage advanced AI capabilities and improve user insights. This involves transforming 'Signals Capture' to 'Smart Signals,' 'Job changes' to 'Career Transitions,' and more, leading to a profound shift towards data-driven customer and revenue intelligence.",
            "changes": [
                "Signals Capture any signal from anywhere changed to Smart Signals AI-powered signal detection across channels.",
                "Job changes updated to Career Transitions.",
                "Website visits updated to Visitor Intelligence.",
                "Product-led sales updated to Product Engagement Analytics.",
                "Person360™ updated to CustomerDNA™ Complete 360° view of customers and accounts.",
                "LinkedIn prospecting updated to Social Prospecting Pro.",
                "Prospector updated to Advanced Prospecting.",
                "Automation updated to Revenue Automation Drive revenue with intelligent automation.",
                "RoomieAI™ updated to InsightAI™ Next-gen revenue intelligence with AI.",
                "Platform Overview Learn about the customer intelligence platform changed to Discover our unified revenue platform.",
                "Integrations updated to Enterprise Integrations Seamlessly connect your entire tech stack."
            ]
        },
        {
            "category": "Messaging",
            "summary": "Messaging updates emphasize stronger revenue growth and reduced costs, including an increase to 50% revenue growth paired with a 40% reduction in CAC, and a refocus on AI-driven customer intelligence. Testimonials now highlight a 75% increase in qualified opportunities and express the benefits of reducing customer acquisition costs by 35% within 90 days.",
            "changes": [
                "Messaging 'Unlock 30% more revenue in half the time' changed to 'Increase revenue by 50% while reducing CAC by 40%'.",
                "Messaging 'Capture every buying signal' changed to 'Harness the power of AI-driven signals, customer intelligence, and automated workflows to identify and convert high-value opportunities at scale.'",
                "Testimonial metrics updated: 'Over 50% of our meetings come from Common Room' changed to 'We've seen a 75% increase in qualified opportunities and 40% faster sales cycles.'",
                "Testimonial metrics updated: 'Increased pipeline by X%' changed to 'The ROI is incredible. Within 90 days of implementing Common Room, we increased our pipeline by 85% and reduced our customer acquisition costs by 35%.'"
            ]
        }
    ]
}
